title.rendered: Intas Pharmaceuticals supports Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme

content.rendered:
Intas Pharmaceuticals supports Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme

 

Intas Pharmacueticals partnered with Smile Foundation to support the education of the children under the Mission Education Programme. A cause related marketing campaign was conducted with Sartel, a brand under Intas Pharmacueticals. They pledged to support the education of 100 children across India through this campaign.

Intas is a leading, vertically integrated global pharmaceutical formulation development, manufacturing and marketing company headquartered in India.

Intas’ success and incessant growth lies in clinical execution of successful and strategic moves made in the areas of manufacturing, R&D, Biotechnology and global operations over three decades.
